templates.header:
Si aad ugu darto mid kale, dhagsii "Ku dar".
Wax ka bedelida tirada dhalashada cusub, booqo boga koowaad.

validate.custom: const entries = data.newbornResidents.length; const validAmount = data.birthsCount; if (entries >= validAmount) valid = 'warning.tooManyEntries'; if (entries <= validAmount) valid = 'warning.tooFewEntries'; if (entries === validAmount) valid = true;

templates.header:
Si aad ugu darto mid kale, dhagsii "Ku dar".
Si aad u beddelatid tirada muddada dheer ama degganeyaasha cusub, tag bogga koowaad.

validate.custom: const entries = row.contacts.length; const validAmount = row.recentContactsSpokenCount; if (entries >= validAmount) valid = 'warning.tooManyEntries'; if (entries <= validAmount) valid = 'warning.tooFewEntries'; if (entries === validAmount) valid = true;

templates.header: Si aad ugu darto mid kale, dhagsii "Ku dar"

validate.custom: const entries = data.adults.filter(o => o.isLongtimeResident === 'yes').length; const validAmount = data.longtimeResidentCount; if (entries >= validAmount) valid = 'warning.tooManyEntries'; if (entries <= validAmount) valid = 'warning.tooFewEntries'; if (entries === validAmount) valid = true;

const entries = data.adults.filter(o => o.isLongtimeResident === 'no').length; const validAmount = data.movedInCount; if (entries >= validAmount) valid = 'warning.tooManyEntries'; if (entries <= validAmount) valid = 'warning.tooFewEntries'; if (entries === validAmount) valid = true;

templates.header:
Si aad ugu darto mid kale, dhagsii "Ku dar".
Si loo beddelo tirada degganeyaashii hore, tag bogga koowaad.

validate.custom: const entries = data.movedOut.length; const validAmount = data.movedOutCount; if (entries >= validAmount) valid = 'warning.tooManyEntries'; if (entries <= validAmount) valid = 'warning.tooFewEntries'; if (entries === validAmount) valid = true;

templates.header:
Si aad ugu darto mid kale, dhagsii "Ku dar".
Wax ka bedelida tirada dhimashada, booqo boga koowaad.

validate.custom: const entries = data.deaths.length; const validAmount = data.deathsCount; if (entries >= validAmount) valid = 'warning.tooManyEntries'; if (entries <= validAmount) valid = 'warning.tooFewEntries'; if (entries === validAmount) valid = true;
